text: Feng Ting-kuo (; 24 September 1950 â€“ 5 June 2018) was a Taiwanese politician. He served on the Taipei City Council from 1985 to 1988, and was a member of the National Assembly between 1992 and 1996. He then represented Taichung County in the Legislative Yuan until 2008. In the early morning of 5 June 2018, Feng died of cardiac arrest at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Taiwanese politicians
title: Feng Ting-kuo
